entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit Customer Support. My name is Emily, and I'll be happy to assist you today. How can I help?
Finally! I've been on hold forever. I need to return something. It's the VeloBand Pulse I ordered a couple of weeks ago.
I understand. I apologize for the wait time. Let me pull up your order information. Can you please provide your order number or the email address associated with the purchase?
It's [customer's email address]. And hurry up, I don’t have all day.
Thank you. One moment... Okay, I see the order here. It includes the VeloBand Pulse. I understand you'd like to return it. Can you tell me the reason for the return?
It's just not what I expected. I thought it would be more like a real smart watch, but it's basically just a glorified fitness tracker. The VeloBand Pulse isn’t what I need.

I understand. I'm sorry to hear that it didn't meet your expectations. Our return policy is designed to ensure customer satisfaction. You can return most items within 90 days of purchase for a full refund. Let me quickly confirm the purchase date...

Okay, I see you purchased it on [Date of Purchase - 15 days prior to call date]. Based on our return policy of 90 days, you are eligible for a full refund. To initiate the return, I will send you a prepaid shipping label to your email address.
Really? Even though it's been over 10 days? I thought I saw something about a shorter window when I bought the VeloBand Pulse.
No need to worry! The standard return policy applies and you have 90 days, from your purchase date. If you have any further questions regarding that, I would be happy to get my manager involved.
Okay, great! So I just print the label and send it back?
Exactly! Once we receive the returned VeloBand Pulse, we will process your refund. You should see it reflected in your account within 7-10 business days.
Fantastic! Thank you so much for your help. I appreciate you making this so easy. Other companies make this so difficult!
You're very welcome! We strive to provide excellent customer service. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
Thank you for calling VeloFit! Have a great day!
